After waiting for an hour and a half,  and a dozen good yelp and trip advisor reviews,  I was expecting an amazing dish.  I'm Asian and I've eaten at a lot if good Japanese restaurant across the globe.  This just isn't one of them.  The fusion didn't work.  The tuna tataki with avocado just wasn't that fresh,  and the guacamole didn't match.  The burger was confused at best.  The miso  soup was interesting and the duck with foie  was pretty good.  Maybe fusion appeals to Europeans,  but this was average at best.  I was also totally underwhelmed by three of momofukus restaurants,  so you be your own judge
